good.name: KSM-66 Ashwagandha Root Extract
good.reason: A premium, full-spectrum adaptogen clinically proven to help reduce stress, lower cortisol, and improve cognitive function and physical endurance.

okay.name: HPMC Capsule Shell
okay.reason: Hydroxypropyl Methylcellulose is a plant-derived, vegetarian-friendly material widely recognized as safe for supplement encapsulation.

good.name: Skimmed Milk
good.reason: High-quality source of complete protein and calcium with zero fat.

good.name: Milk Solids
good.reason: Provides concentrated dairy protein and essential minerals like phosphorus.

good.name: Cocoa Powder
good.reason: Contains natural antioxidants (flavonoids) and provides flavor without added sugar.

good.name: BCAA (Branched-Chain Amino Acids)
good.reason: Essential for muscle protein synthesis and recovery after exercise.

okay.name: Water
okay.reason: Essential hydrating base for the drink.

okay.name: Nature Identical Flavouring Substances
okay.reason: Chemically identical to natural flavors, used for consistent taste but is a processed additive.

okay.name: Acidity Regulators (INS 340, 452, 339)
okay.reason: Mineral salts used to maintain pH and stability; generally safe but contribute to phosphorus intake.

okay.name: Edible Common Salt
okay.reason: Used for flavor enhancement; contributes a small amount of sodium.

bad.name: Carrageenan (INS 407)
bad.reason: A thickener derived from seaweed that may cause digestive inflammation or bloating in sensitive individuals.

bad.name: Sucralose (INS 955)
bad.reason: An artificial sweetener that provides sweetness without calories but may negatively impact gut microbiome health.

good.name: Salmon Fish Oil
good.reason: A high-quality source of essential Omega-3 fatty acids in triglyceride form, which offers superior absorption compared to ethyl esters.

good.name: EPA (Eicosapentaenoic Acid)
good.reason: An essential fatty acid that supports heart health, helps manage cholesterol, and reduces systemic inflammation.

good.name: DHA (Docosahexaenoic Acid)
good.reason: Crucial for brain development, cognitive function, and maintaining healthy vision.

good.name: Vitamin E (DL-Alpha-Tocopheryl Acetate)
good.reason: An antioxidant that prevents the delicate fish oil from oxidizing and becoming rancid.

okay.name: Gelatin
okay.reason: A standard animal-derived protein used to form the softgel capsule shell.

okay.name: Glycerin
okay.reason: A humectant used to keep the capsule shell flexible and prevent it from becoming brittle.

okay.name: Sorbitol
okay.reason: A sugar alcohol used as a plasticizer to maintain the integrity of the softgel.

okay.name: Purified Water
okay.reason: A safe solvent used in the manufacturing process of the capsule.

okay.name: Triethyl Citrate
okay.reason: A food-grade stabilizer often used in the enteric coating of capsules.

bad.name: Methylparaben (INS 218)
bad.reason: A synthetic preservative that has been associated with potential endocrine disruption in some studies.

bad.name: Ethyl Vanillin
bad.reason: An artificial flavoring agent used to mask the natural fishy taste and odor.
